mapper.sql: id, `name`, icon, `order`, url, create_at, create_by, update_at, update_by
mapper.select: select a.url from menu a, role_menu b where a.id = b.menu_id and b.role_id =#{roleId}

select from menu where 1=1
and name like concat('%',#{menuName},'%')
mapper.insert:
insert into menu
id,
`name`,
icon,
`order`,
url,
create_at,
create_by,
update_at,
update_by,

mapper.update:
update menu
`name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`order` = #{order,jdbcType=INTEGER},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_at = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_at = #{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update menu set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `order` = #{order,jdbcType=INTEGER}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_at = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_at = #{updateAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
